announcements.title: Spring Sale!
announcements.message: 20% off all rentals taking place during the week of 3-27 through 4-2! Book now!

announcements.title: Flood Warning!
announcements.message: There is a river flood warning in effect until Thursday 3-23 in the Portland area. If you are scheduled for a Portland rental during this time period, and your rental is in an affected area, we will be contacting you with refund/rescheduling options.

announcements.title: We're Hiring!
announcements.message: Interested in joining our team? We're looking to expand in the Portland area. Current openings for Ember JS developers and customer service reps. Experience in the travel industry is a plus. Please submit resumes to superrentalsrep@superrentals.com
